comment: Everyone gets upset when their holy object is drawn obscenely. Muslims with Muhammad, Jews with alt right memes, Americans with children. Why is the child holy for the American? Because their state is based purely on the infantile and adolescent point of view of "freedom" and "democracy" for all.
